name: 13 India- Japan Bilateral Conference
content: Biyani Group of Colleges Jaipur feels proud to host the Biyaniâ€™s International Conference 2018 (BICON), event Co-Organised with Indian Council of Social Science Research , National Assessment and Accreditation Council , Japan Advanced Institute of Science & Technology, SAITAMA University and KYUSHU University Japan. Conference is composed of three symposiums, each specialized in specific knowledge areas including (i) Science/Nursing, (ii) IT , Commerce & Management, (iii) Social Science, Law and Education Department. (Day-1) Nov. 26, 2018; Monday : Sustainable Development in Computing Technologies for Business World (Day-2) Nov. 27, 2018; Tuesday : Environmental Sensitivity and Sustainable Development (Day-3) Nov. 28, 2018; Wednesday : Humanities to the Rescue of Sustainability & Legal Frame work : Challenges, Issues and Perspectives Research papers accepted till 10'November 2018.
